entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Chevery
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:59 AM AST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -18.9°C

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 16.
